pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, February 13, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Whitehorse, Yukon

Private meetings

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of the Yukon, Ranj Pillai.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour a tech and startup incubator and meet with local entrepreneurs.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

10:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
